Package org.pepstock.charba.client

Class NativeHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.NativeHelpers
  • @JsType(isNative=true,
        name="CharbaChartHelpers",
        namespace="<global>")
final class NativeHelpers
extends Object
    This is the java script native object which is the helpers utility of CHART.JS.
    It maps the java script object chart.helpers.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      (package private) NativeObject clone​(NativeObject source)
      Returns a deep copy of source without keeping references on objects and arrays.
      (package private) String formatNumber​(double number, String locale, NativeObject options)
      Format a number using a localized number formatter.
      (package private) NativeObject getRelativePosition​(NativeBaseEvent event, Chart chart)
      A common occurrence is taking an event, such as a click, and finding the data coordinates on the chart where the event occurred.
      (package private) NativeObject mergeIf​(NativeObject target, NativeObject source)
      Recursively deep copies source properties in the target only if not defined in target.
      IMPORTANT: target is not cloned and will be updated with source properties.
      (package private) NativeObject toFont​(NativeObject font)
      Parses font options and returns the font object.

    • Method Detail

      • mergeIf

        @JsMethod
NativeObject mergeIf​(NativeObject target,
                     NativeObject source)
        Recursively deep copies source properties in the target only if not defined in target.
        IMPORTANT: target is not cloned and will be updated with source properties.
        Parameters:
        target - the target object in which all sources are merged into.
        source - object to merge in the target.
        Returns:
        the target object

      • clone

        @JsMethod
NativeObject clone​(NativeObject source)
        Returns a deep copy of source without keeping references on objects and arrays.
        Parameters:
        source - the value to clone.
        Returns:
        a clone of source object

      • getRelativePosition

        @JsMethod
NativeObject getRelativePosition​(NativeBaseEvent event,
                                 Chart chart)
        A common occurrence is taking an event, such as a click, and finding the data coordinates on the chart where the event occurred. It provides the relative point on canvas.
        Parameters:
        event - native event to be used for getting the point.
        chart - chart instance
        Returns:
        a point object

      • toFont

        @JsMethod
NativeObject toFont​(NativeObject font)
        Parses font options and returns the font object.
        Parameters:
        font - a object that contains font options to be parsed.
        Returns:
        a font object

      • formatNumber

        @JsMethod
String formatNumber​(double number,
                    String locale,
                    NativeObject options)
        Format a number using a localized number formatter.
        Parameters:
        number - the number to format
        locale - the locale to pass to the Intl.NumberFormat constructor
        options - Intl number format options
        Returns:
        a number formatted string
